summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.9°C) and outside temperature (down 4.8°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 17%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 529 m) and light levels (up 12373 lux).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (up 332 m), and light levels (up 11503 lux) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 412m and a high of 1807m, averaging 524.8m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, neither too dry nor too humid and light winds will prevail. Showers, the sky will be mostly cloudy (or even foggy) with low clouds, and a mix of sun and clouds. Weather patterns to stay the same.
